name: MyOres!
description:
My Ores!

After a hard day at work at the mines you're finally ready to go back home, but a horde of thieving slimes shows up. Spin your trusted pickaxe and protect your ores.

How to play

Tap to spin in the direction the pickaxe is pointing.

Tips

When the pickaxe is linedup with a slime, the slime will turn red

-

Game developed for Internet game jam

Theme One-button

Rules:

  • - Game must only use one button, and be geared around getting a "high score" (highest points, best time, etc)
  • -   Must be  built with Unity   and  be playable on web (with demo   uploaded to itch.io)
  • - Must be simple & small    enough to work on mobile web (compiled as Web GL)
  • -  Must be equally playable   on desktop and mobile (no distinct advantage to players on either  platform)
  •  -   Only custom,  open source and royalty free assets can be used

Credits:

Art - Jamiebrownhill jamiebrownhill.itch.io

Intro Music - Section 31 -Tech https://opengameart.org/users/section31
